description:
Don’t know where to start using social media or technology in your business? In this workshop, you’ll discover a step by step action plan for beginners to grow your business through the internet.

Not understanding technology and online marketing is no excuse for a tech savvy market and you could be missing out on massive revenue!

You’ll build the confidence to make a few simple changes that will lead to better results with online marketing.

Most business owners make the same mistake when promoting their business online and this workshop will teach you how to avoid it.

We’ll reveal three ways to grow your business and keep current clients and how technology can make or break your business.

This is your opportunity to learn a proven process to reach a larger audience and run a stress-free business, while applying your life skills to the digital world.

The “Six Essential Steps to Successful Online Marketing” workshop is by Crystal Girgenti, a "tell it like it is" technology and online marketing consultant and founder of The Social Strategist and Discover Your Inner Geek™.


***Of note: This course was filmed during a live seminar and the audio is understandable, though perhaps not of professional quality.***
title: Six Essential Steps to Successful Online Marketing
